MechWorkModeDef.label: safe yourself
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, regardless of type, will attack enemies that get too close. In case of damage, they will try to retreat to a safe zone if possible.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Safe <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> If damaged <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No

MechWorkModeDef.label: hive mind research
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, regardless of type, will generate research points relative to their bandwidth cost. The speed and efficiency of research directly depends on the number of mechanoids involved in it.
If there is an enemy on the map or in case of damage, the mechanoids will head to a safe zone.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Safe <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> If damaged <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: scavenging mode
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, regardless of type, will search for useful resources in special "Scavenge" zones.
If there is an enemy on the map or in case of damage, the mechanoids will head to a safe zone.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Safe <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> If damaged <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: find and destroy
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, regardless of their type, will look for enemies and try to destroy them.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: wait enemy
MechWorkModeDef.description:
The mechanoid will shutdown and wait for the enemy, and when it appears, it will wake up and head towards the target.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No

MechWorkModeDef.label: work and wait
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, depending on the type, will work, and when an enemy appears, they will drop everything and go to destroy him. If they don't have a job, they'll just shutdown.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: ambush
MechWorkModeDef.description:
The mechanoid shutdown and waits for the enemy to approach it, then attacks.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Ambush <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No

MechWorkModeDef.label: work and recharge
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Work autonomously according to mechanoid type. If the mechanoid cannot work or it has done all the work it shuts down.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Work <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: work if safe
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids will work, but only as long as there are no enemies on the map. In case of danger, they will try to get to the <color=#f5ffa2>safe spot</color>.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Safe, Work <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: work, recharge and escort
MechWorkModeDef.description:
The mechanoid will accompany the overseer if it does not have a job, and will also be charged if necessary.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No

MechWorkModeDef.label: escort if enemy, work and recharge
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, regardless of their type, will accompany the overseer when an enemy is in their zone of operation. Otherwise, they will work.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: escort if drafted or downed
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, regardless of type, will accompany an overseer if it is drafted or downed.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: escort if enemy
MechWorkModeDef.description:
Mechanoids, regardless of type, will accompany the overseer, but only if there is an enemy on the map. When there is no enemy, mechanoids shutdown.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> Yes <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> Yes

MechWorkModeDef.label: escort and recharge
MechWorkModeDef.description:
The mechanoid, regardless of its type, will accompany the overseer and, if necessary, go to charge.
<color=#f5ffa2>Type:</color> Combat <color=#f5ffa2>Enemy searching:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Shutdown:</color> No <color=#f5ffa2>Smart charging:</color> No
